name: Continuity (Felipe Budinich)
description:
Continuity, not a game, but an experiment on narrative devices. Based on Julio Cortázar's "Continuity of Parks"

Click, then type to play.

Follow me on Twitter: 
https://twitter.com/FelipeBudinich

Source Code available at:
http://gamejolt.com/games/other/continuity/18582/ (click on "Download Game" to download a *.7z file)
https://github.com/FelipeBudinich/Continuity (Clone the repository to have the latest version)
